scope.title: How to create SVG-ready icon symbols in Sketch PART 2
scope.description: Something has always existed. According to physics, there can never be true physical nothingness—though there can be times when existence resembles nothing, such as a vacuum (the state of minimum possible energy) (Phys.org). Creating a space where there are no quantum.
